original_title: Dr. Daniel Amen shares easy breathing trick to fight stress and anxiety | Fox News
article_summary: Dr. Daniel Amen recommends a 15-second diaphragmatic breathing technique to reduce anxiety and calm the mind, which involves inhaling for four seconds, holding for a second and a half, exhaling for eight seconds, and holding for another second and a half. This technique triggers a relaxation response and improves heart rate variability, according to Amen.</s>
